New Records: Mitchell Marsh scored his maiden ODI World Cup century
Marsh formed Australia's highest first-wicket partnership in ODI World Cups with David Warner
This is the first time that two Australian openers have scored centuries in ODI World Cups
Key Match Events: Marsh got to the hundred-run mark in 100 balls, hitting 10 boundaries and six maximums against Pakistan in Bengaluru
Marsh went on to score 121 runs off 108 balls, smashing 10 boundaries and nine maximums
Warner and Marsh put up 259 runs for the opening wicket in Bengaluru
Pre-Game Insights: Australia lost their opening two matches in the tournament against hosts India and South Africa
The Aussies find themselves in the middle of the World Cup 2023 points table and are still two places off the top-four spots
Miscellaneous Highlights: Marsh celebrated his birthday in style by scoring his maiden ODI World Cup century
Others: Australia bounced back with a comfortable win against 1996 champions Sri Lanka
